section.title: Installing the OpenStack Dashboard
section.para: Here are the overall steps for creating the OpenStack dashboard.

listitem.para: Install the OpenStack Dashboard framework including Apache and related modules.
Restart and run the Apache server.

section.para: Install the OpenStack Dashboard, as root:

Next, modify the variable CACHE_BACKEND in /etc/openstack-dashboard/local_settings.py to match the ones set in /etc/memcached.conf. Open /etc/openstack-dashboard/local_settings.py and look for this line:

note.para: The address and port in the new value need to be equal to the ones set in /etc/memcached.conf.

section.para: If you change the memcached settings, restart the Apache web server for the changes to take effect.
